parameters.name: CurrentConnectionString
parameters.description: The current endpoint that you want to modify.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> If this parameter is set to the ID of a sharded cluster instance, the `NodeId` parameter is also required.

parameters.name: NewConnectionString
parameters.description:
The new endpoint prefix. The prefix must meet the following requirements:

- Starts with a lowercase letter.

- Ends with a lowercase letter or a digit.

- Contains only lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-).

- Is 8 to 63 characters in length.

> Specify only the prefix of the endpoint. The domain name suffix cannot be changed.

parameters.name: NewPort
parameters.description:
The new port. The value must be an integer from 1000 to 65535.

> This parameter is available only when the `DBInstanceId` parameter is set to the ID of a cloud disk instance.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of a Mongos node in the sharded cluster instance. You can specify only one Mongos node ID per call.

> This parameter is available only when the `DBInstanceId` parameter is set to the ID of a sharded cluster instance.
